import React from "react"; import UploadImage from "../assets/Images/video-list-5.jpg"; import Header from "./Header"; import uuid from "uuid/v4"; export default function Upload() { const handleUpload = event => { //creates new comment event.preventDefault(); let video = { channel: "John Doe", title: event.target.title.value, desciption: event.target.description.value, id: uuid(), image: "https://assets.simpleviewinc.com/simpleview/image/upload/c_limit,h_1200,q_75,w_1200/v1/clients/vancouverbc/Aerial_Sunset_Vancouver_d3_copy_1bb86ed0-1edc-4cda-841d-0b033ca0bb72.jpg" }; // this.props.addComment(comment); document.querySelector("#upload-video").reset(); }; return ( <>
